Simple Process

How It Works

Get actionable design insights in three simple steps. No design expertise required.

01

Paste Your URL

Enter your landing page URL. Our engine captures a full screenshot and begins analysis.

02

AI-Powered Analysis

We analyse 7 design dimensions against patterns from 50+ award-winning sites.

03

Get Recommendations

Receive prioritised, actionable recommendations with estimated conversion impact.

7 Analysis Dimensions

Comprehensive Design Analysis

Every aspect of your landing page evaluated against proven design patterns from award-winning sites.

92

Visual Hierarchy

Analyse how effectively your page guides visitors through content

88

Typography

Evaluate font choices, sizes, and readability across devices

85

Colour & Contrast

Check accessibility compliance and visual appeal of your palette

78

Whitespace

Measure breathing room and balance in your layout

94

CTA Design

Assess call-to-action visibility, placement, and effectiveness

90

Mobile Responsiveness

Verify your design works beautifully on all screen sizes

82

Loading Performance

Identify speed optimisations for better user experience
